name: AlemHealth
headline: AI Radiologist in a Box - We provide a vertically integrated AIâ¦
description:
AlemHealth connects hospitals and diagnostic centres in emerging markets to a global network of diagnostic imaging services. 

Our suite of plug-and-play radiology solutions makes it easy for any facility anywhere to access and provide world-class diagnostic care to its patients. We designed our hardware and software from the ground up specifically for emerging markets, where access to internet, electricity, and clinicians can be difficult.
Learn more about our solutions at www.alemhealth.com.

# Transforming Teleradiologyfor a Connected World
Experience seamless, AI-enabled radiology workflows with AlemHealth's intuitive and cost-effective platform. Efficiently store, share, view, and report medical imaging studies, while enhancing accessibility to patients and healthcare facilities globally.

## Modern RIS/PACS Solutions That Just Work Everywhere
At AlemHealth, we understand the challenges radiologists, hospitals, and diagnostic centers face in managing medical images and reports. Our vertically integrated, AI-enabled solutions combine state-of-the-art hardware, software, and AI capabilities to simplify and streamline your radiology workflow, all at a cost-effective price.

## Innovative Software Solutions for Radiology Workflows
Manage, view, and report on medical images with our AlemHealth Connect Radiology Reporting Suite, Desktop Uploader, FrontDesk, and Patient App. Powered by advanced AI, our platform quickly and professionally generates reports from your shorthand or dictation, with immediate RADPeer scoring for quality control.
[AlemHealth Connect Radiology Reporting Suite](https://www.alemhealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[AlemHealth Frontdesk RIS](https://www.alemhealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[AlemHealth Connect Desktop Uploader](https://www.alemhealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)[AlemHealth Patient App](https://www.alemhealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-3>)[Unlimited Storage](https://www.alemhealth.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-4>)
Efficiently manage, view, and report on medical images with intuitive workflow tools, HIPAA-compliant security, an FDA-approved cloud viewer, and AI-powered features tailored to your radiology practice.
[Learn More![btn icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a18ada2c281c63cec8a7ca/64a1a84a2c281c63cee03c07_ri_arrow-right-line.svg)](https://www.alemhealth.com/</software#Radiology>)
Streamline your operations with FrontDesk RIS, offering intuitive patient scheduling, seamless MWL and HL7 integration, and AI-enhanced workflow management tools.
[Learn More![btn icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a18ada2c281c63cec8a7ca/64a1a84a2c281c63cee03c07_ri_arrow-right-line.svg)](https://www.alemhealth.com/</software#RIS>)
Quickly and easily upload medical images from your desktop, providing seamless integration with AlemHealth Connect and ensuring access to your studies anytime, anywhere.
[Download Now![btn icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a18ada2c281c63cec8a7ca/64a1a84a2c281c63cee03c07_ri_arrow-right-line.svg)](https://www.alemhealth.com/</software#desktop-uploader>)
Provide patients with immediate, secure access to their medical images and reports, and facilitate easy sharing with referring physicians through seamless QR-code integration
[Learn More![btn icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64a18ada2c281c63cec8a7ca/64a1a84a2c281c63cee03c07_ri_arrow-right-line.svg)](https://www.alemhealth.com/</software#patient-app>)
About how our app can benefit your practice and patients
Experience hassle-free storage with AlemHealth Connect's unlimited storage capacity for medical images from any hospital or imaging center, eliminating the need for CDs, email attachments, VPNs, or unnecessary traveling to facilities.

generated_description:
### AlemHealth: Revolutionizing Radiology in Emerging Markets

**Overview:**
AlemHealth is a health-tech company on a mission to democratize access to high-quality diagnostic care in emerging markets through innovative, AI-powered solutions. Their vision? An "AI Radiologist in a Box" that makes advanced radiology services as simple as plugging in a device.

**Background:**
Founded in Singapore and part of Y Combinator's W17 batch, AlemHealth started by connecting hospitals and diagnostic centers in developing regions to a global network of diagnostic imaging capabilities. With a team of 25, they create hardware and software specifically designed for areas with challenges in internet access and electricity.

**Core Offerings:**
AlemHealth offers a suite of vertically integrated solutions for radiology, which includes:
- **AlemBox DICOM Gateway:** Facilitates high-volume image uploads to the cloud from imaging equipment.
- **AlemHub Enterprise Reporting Server:** Allows multiple radiologists to report on studies concurrently.
- **AI-Enhanced Reporting Suite:** Automates the generation of diagnostic reports using AI to boost efficiency and accuracy.

Their platform enables users to upload, store, and access unlimited medical images from anywhere, minimize errors through AI-driven quality control, and collaborate more effectively among healthcare providers and patients.

**Unique Features:**
- **Customizability:** Their solutions can be tailored to fit the unique needs of each healthcare facility.
- **Accessibility:** Designed to be operational even in low-resource settings.
- **Community Support:** AlemHealth fosters a global network allowing radiologists to collaborate and share knowledge, enhancing the quality of care available.

**Pricing Model:**
AlemHealth adopts a flexible, budget-friendly pricing strategy with plans that cater to different needs—from free accounts for low-volume sites to comprehensive paid subscriptions.

- **Free Plan:** Ideal for personal use with limited uploads.
- **Paid Subscriptions:** Range from $25 to $299 per month, offering advanced features for higher efficiency and collaboration.

**Conclusion:**
AlemHealth is at the intersection of health-tech and AI, leveraging these tools to tackle significant access issues in radiology. Their innovative solutions not only simplify workflows but also empower healthcare providers in emerging markets to deliver world-class care, transforming the way radiology services are accessed globally. For more details, visit [AlemHealth](https://www.alemhealth.com).
